Text:
I hope everyone who loved this show as a child can relive some of those fond memories.

Please help seed and keep this torrent alive.
To all of the inital downloaders, sorry for the speeds as my upload rate is capped by my crappy ISP...
Not sure where my last comment went, but to the initial downloaders:  sorry about the speeds but my upload rate is capped by my ISP.

id get this cuz i liked the show when i was a kid for the first few episodes, sitting around w a huge plastic bowl of cereal in front of the tv on sat mornings. but i seem to remember that the animation changed at some point, and it just wasnt as quality as when it started and i got disinterested after a while.

Note read this on a Amazon review

Not nit-picking but what company released this set? If this is NOT the Mill Creek Entertainment release (2009) then on the episode "The Dragon's Graveyard" (generally considered to be the best episode of the entire series) then the musical score has been changed to a less powerful one on the BCI-released.
:/
speed is not an issue with me ...knowing I will be able to watch a fond memory, is worth it. Thank you VERY much!
greatest cartoon ever.  best character development, some serious episodes and great stories.
